header.title: Inside Powerful Secrets of A Master Voodoo Priest
header.category: Western Esotericism, Occultism, Voodoo, Self-help, Numerology

central_thesis: The book reveals ancient occult secrets and specialized Voodoo practices, emphasizing the paramount power of faith and the subconscious mind, combined with specific rituals and consecrated mystical tools (charms, incenses, candles, oils, baths), to achieve personal success, wealth, love, health, and protection from negative influences, including bad luck and evil spells, culminating in the attainment of "great personal powers" and the ability to influence outcomes like lottery wins.

structure_content.chapter_title: The Mystical Secrets of Dr. Thessalonía De Prince
structure_content.summary: Introduction to the author's background in occult practice and the book's purpose: to teach ancient secrets for overcoming problems and achieving success through personal power.
A welcome message to the reader, emphasizing the transformative nature of the forthcoming "secret lessons" and the role of a "special mystical charm" in personal power and luck.

Explores the intrinsic power of the human mind, especially the subconscious, and introduces methods involving spiritual items to awaken "super powers" like Mental Telepathy and Metal Alchemy, with "Faith" as the crucial underlying principle.

Discusses the reality and power of thoughts and evil spells, particularly Voodoo practices, underscoring "Faith" as the essential ingredient for spell casting and self-protection, augmented by mystical items.

structure_content.chapter_title: The Mystical Helping Hand Charm / How To Obtain Or Control Your Lover Through Dreams:
structure_content.summary: Describes a divinely blessed charm and provides a detailed ritual for using it with incense, candles, and visualization to influence a lover's dreams and actions.

structure_content.chapter_title: How To Obtain And Keep The One You Love: / To keep your love one faithful and true to you. / How to Regain Lost Love, And Gain New Friends:
structure_content.summary: Offers principles for successful relationships and specific rituals using roots, oils, candles, and charms to ensure fidelity and attract or regain lost love and friendships.

structure_content.chapter_title: How To Find Out What You Want Through Your Dreams. / How to Get Financial Help Through The Dream Process:
structure_content.summary: Provides a ritual to induce prophetic dreams for clarity on desires and outlines a philosophy of money combined with spells to attract financial success, emphasizing belief in abundance.

structure_content.chapter_title: Dr. DePrince Special Spell to Help Bring Powerful Money Vibrations In Your Life.
structure_content.summary: Details a money-attraction spell using parchment, visual aids, and specialized incense, introducing the concept of a "money bag charm" and reinforcing faith with biblical verses.

structure_content.chapter_title: How To Regain Your Health And Keep Healthy:
structure_content.summary: Presents a spiritual approach to health, attributing illness to uncontrolled energies and negative emotions, and provides a ritual using a healing charm and prayer for physical and mental well-being.

structure_content.chapter_title: Revelation 8:4 (KJV) and the smoke of the incense... / How Psychic Powers Voodoo Incense Is Made and Used.
structure_content.summary: Explains the traditional and practical application of various spiritual incenses for luck, success, and removing negative vibrations, emphasizing proper selection and intent.

structure_content.chapter_title: (List of Incenses for specific problems) / Special Voodoo Psychic Brand Incense that can help you.
structure_content.summary: Catalogues various specialized incense brands and their specific magical uses for problems ranging from gambling to protection, astral projection, and occult performance.

structure_content.chapter_title: Special Psychic Voodoo Magic Candles that can help you / Special Seven Day Color Candles:
structure_content.summary: Introduces the power of mystical colored candles, their dressing with oils, and their symbolic correspondences to different magical intentions (love, money, health, protection, etc.).

structure_content.chapter_title: How to use The Real Hidden Secret Power To Get Anything in Life You Want
structure_content.summary: Reaffirms faith as the ultimate hidden power, a divine gift capable of manifesting desires and overcoming obstacles.

structure_content.chapter_title: How to Find Your Winning Numbers. The Mystical Key to Winning Big At Lottery and The Numbers Game. / Ancient Psychic Magical Number System: / How to Find Your Lucky Numbers: / The Secret Vibrations Of Numbers and how they can help you / How To Use The Lucky Number Vibrational Chart: / How To Find Your Daily Lucky Numbers: / How To Find Your Lucky Day To Play: / How To Find Your Lucky Numbers Though Your Dreams:
structure_content.summary: A comprehensive section detailing an "Ancient Psychic Magical Number System" (numerology) based on Egyptian/Hindu traditions, explaining how to calculate personal lucky numbers from names and birth dates, interpret number vibrations (planetary, thematic, color, day correspondences), and apply these to identify lucky days and winning combinations for games of chance, including dream interpretation for numbers.

structure_content.chapter_title: How to use Lucky Occult and Mystical Charms:
structure_content.summary: A brief concluding section encouraging the use of the author's charms, baths, candles, incense, stones, and talismans, and referring to another book for more detailed knowledge.
A printable charm design (footprint with horseshoe and money bag) for personal use, to be activated with a written wish and placed in a shoe.

key_concepts.definition: Ancient, secret practices utilizing spiritual forces for self-improvement, problem-solving, and manifestation.
The fundamental, most powerful element required for any magical operation or occult item to be effective; without it, all work is "dead" (page 4).
The source of innate power within an individual; control over it is key to awakening "super powers" (page 4).
Divine or cosmic energies that can be invoked and directed to achieve magical outcomes, often through prayer and visualization (page 6).
A blessed, powerful amulet symbolizing divine assistance, used in various rituals for luck, success, love, and health (page 6).
Consecrated aromatic compounds, burned to create specific vibrations, cleanse negative energies, and attract desired outcomes (e.g., money, love, protection) (page 13).
Colored candles dressed with oils and used in rituals, with each color corresponding to specific magical intentions (page 17).
The "secret art of attracting things, persons and conditions" to oneself, one of the "super powers" unlocked by mind control (page 4).
An ancient system, distinct from Western numerology, for finding lucky numbers, interpreting numerical vibrations, and applying them for prognostication and influencing chance outcomes (page 21).
A practitioner capable of casting both beneficial and harmful spells, specifically mentioned for using dolls to link with victims for evil spells (page 5).
A spiritual entity or energy that, when properly aligned with, helps to attract money into one's life (page 9).
A spiritual energy that is awakened during visualization, capable of destroying fear, uneasiness, and uncertainty (page 8).
A foundational belief that thoughts possess tangible power and can influence reality, for good or ill (page 5).

practical_system.description: The system is primarily operative, focused on utilizing "ancient secrets of occult magic" through a combination of unwavering faith, mind control, visualization, and the strategic use of consecrated mystical items. It aims to empower individuals to manifest desires related to wealth, love, health, and protection, and even predict outcomes through numerology and dream interpretation. The author provides specific instructions for preparing and using various tools in conjunction with prayers, chants, and focused intent.
tools: Mystical Helping Hand Charm (also referred to as Blessed Mystical Helping Hand Charm, Blessed Healing Helping Hand Charm)

Candles (SPECIAL Purple candle, special pink candle, Blue Spiritual candle, Dr.DePrince special Magnetic Candle, various colored candles, e.g., Red, Green, White, Blue, Purple, Brown, Yellow, Black, Pink, Orange, Gold, Gray)
Spiritual baths (general term, Dr. DePrince Special Jinx Removing Bath Wash)
Dr. De-Prince Lover's Controlling Band Incense
Dr. DePrince Money Drawing Band Incense
Special money bag charm (containing herbs, powders, stones)
Black small iron pot with three legs

Specific incenses: Gamblers Incense, Lover's Brand, Master Controlling with Lovers Brand Incense, Frankincense, Adam Eve, Money Drawing, Dr. DePrince Famous Devil Dust Incense, Helping Hand Incense, High John the Conjured Incense, Attracting Brand Incense, King Solomon brand incense, Astral Projection Brand, Wealthy Way, Run Devil Run, Jinx Removing, Occult Magic Brand
rituals: Mind Control & Super Powers: Training the mental mind, using secret incense, candles, spiritual baths to awaken subconscious powers (page 4).
Self-Protection: Learning to protect oneself against "evil spells" and "jealous thoughts" (page 5).

Lover Control (Dreams): Writing desires on parchment, folding around Mystical Helping Hand Charm, placing under pillow, lighting SPECIAL Purple candle, burning Dr. De-Prince Lover's Controlling Band Incense, visualizing desired dreams/actions, repeating specific prayer for seven days (page 6).

Fidelity & Love Attraction: On new moon, placing Adam Eve root under partner's pillow (Adam) and practitioner's (Eve), adding Dr.DePrince Special Lover's Oil to water by bed, repeating wish and blowing into water seven times, burning pink candle, repeating specific prayer with Mystical Hand Charm over burning incense (page 7).

Attracting Friends/Partners: Holding Mystical Helping Hand Charm in left hand, deep breaths, visualizing blue light and "fluid of understanding love," visualizing "Spiritual Astral Powers" becoming "Controlling Flame," lighting Dr.DePrince special Magnetic Candle, holding Charm over burning incense, repeating specific prayer for nine mornings (page 8).

Prophetic Dreams: Sparse eating/drinking, using Dr. DePrince Special Jinx Removing Bath Wash, lighting Blue Spiritual candle, burning Dr.DePrince King Solomon Incense, holding Blessed Mystical Helping Hand Charm, repeating prayer to "Mother of Light and Love," making holy cross seven times, placing Charm under pillow (page 9).
Financial Abundance: Daily visualization of money, placing Blessed Mystical Helping Hand on money, repeating specific prayer to "Great Father of all things" (page 10).

Money Attraction Spell: Writing desires on parchment, pasting pictures of desired lifestyle, burning Dr. DePrince Money Drawing Band Incense, holding parchment over smoke, visualizing achievement, repeating daily (page 11).
Health & Healing: Placing Blessed Healing Helping Hand Charm over third eye daily, repeating specific prayer to "invisible healing force of God's blessed healing powers" (page 12).
General Incense Use: Writing wish on parchment, placing under burner, looking at smoke, repeating wish/prayer/psalms, daily practice (page 15).
Specialized Incense Use: Burning specific incenses for gambling, love, protection, jinx removal, etc., sometimes with additional actions like calling names or writing on paper (page 16-17).
Candle Magic: Rubbing candles with Magnet Oil, concentrating, burning seven minutes daily (before bed/upon rising), reading Psalms (page 17).
Numerological Calculations: Reducing names, birth dates, addresses, and current dates to single digits (1-9) to find "lucky numbers" and "vibrations" (page 22-26).
Dream-Derived Lucky Numbers: Reducing key dream elements (e.g., words) to numerical values (page 27).
Charm Cutout: Cutting out the footprint charm, writing a wish on the back, and placing it in a shoe (page 29).

relevant_quotes.text: The ancient secrets of occult magic that was once practice in secret by the selected few can now be yours to use and to help you reach your goals.
One of the most important keys to personal power is Faith. Without faith all work is dead.
You are the product of your mind and your secret thoughts.
The power of evil spells is very real. The Voodoo priest uses a doll to cast their wicked spells on others.
(KJV) And the smoke of the incense, which came with the prayers of the saints, ascended before God out of the angel's hand.
"Oh Mighty Influence of the Spiritual Astral Powers in the force of Air," please take the wishes of my heart to God and bring them back fulfilled according to what God sees best for me.
Remember, no occult items will work unless you have faith in them.
Hebrews 11:1 (KJV) now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
It is our fears and lack of faith that is the cause of all of our problems.
Matthew 9:29 (KJV) Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.

Many believers in the mystic arts believe that you can influence the Goddess of Good Luck and like a lady, it you worship her and treat her well. She will reward you with great wealth beyond your dreams.

critical_analysis.relevance: The book offers a syncretic approach to magic, blending elements of Voodoo, Hoodoo (implied by charms, oils, roots), numerology (framed as an "Ancient Psychic Magical Number System" distinct from Western numerology), biblical references (KJV), and New Age self-help concepts (mind power, visualization). It is highly relevant to individuals interested in practical magic for material and personal improvement, especially those drawn to Voodoo/Hoodoo traditions and a strong emphasis on faith and personal agency. It attempts to demystify complex magical concepts by framing them as accessible "secrets."
critical_analysis.target_audience: Individuals seeking practical, results-oriented magical solutions for everyday problems related to love, money, health, protection, and luck. This includes beginners in occultism, self-help enthusiasts interested in spiritual methods, and those already practicing folk magic who might be looking for specific spells and tools. The language is accessible and direct, avoiding overly academic or complex magical jargon, making it appealing to a broad audience looking for immediate magical applications.
